p: For rs1491942, significant allelic and genotypic frequency is observed in the subgroups with higher Native American ancestry. This polymorphism was estimated to be a PD risk factor in subjects with ≤56.5% Native American ancestry. In the subgroup with 56.6–65%, the estimation was (OR 2.26 [1.04–4.91] p 0.04), and in subjects with ≤66% Native American ancestry (OR 2.94 [1.38–6.23] p 0.01) in an additive model.
